participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and compassionate, David enjoys connecting with others and sharing his love for cooking.
participant_1.background: I enjoy spending time with my wife and friends, and I love her pasta. I enjoy cooking Italian food. I still like unicorns even though I'm an adult. I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder. I lost my job as a nurse after I was diagnosed with cancer.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Determined and resilient, Lily is pursuing her dreams while balancing her current job and personal interests.
participant_2.background: I lost a patient in my arms. During the week, I work as a barista. I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy. I want to be a journalist but instead I sell washers at Sears. I currently work at Target.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing?
Pretty good, trying to keep my spirits up.
What do you mean by that?
I lost a patient in my arms recently, which is why I'm not working as a nurse anymore.
I am so sorry to hear that. I can't imagine how difficult that must have been.
Thank you. It was really tough.
I'm working as a barista during the week, and I sell washers at sears on the weekends.
That sounds like a lot of work.
Yeah, it is. But I'm trying to keep myself busy.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to play video games, go for walks with my dog Percy, and read.
I love to cook Italian food. What's your favorite dish to make?
I love making lasagna, especially when I can use fresh pasta.
I've never made lasagna, but it looks delicious.
You should try it sometime. It's really easy to make.
I might just have to do that.
